dublinCore.dc:title: HCON 30 ENR: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Seventeenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Sunday, the third day of January, two thousand and twenty-one
form.official-title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

section.text: That the two Houses of Congress assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on Wednesday, April 28, 2021, at 9:00 p.m., for the purpose of receiving such communication as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.

attestation-group.role: Clerk of the House of Representatives.
